welcomeMessage: Welcome to ShareHome, the independant way to find shelter from the russian invaders. You may search for local sponsors in the city/country you are in and apply to reside with the sponsor.
name: Your name
offerHouse: Offer someone a place to stay
title: Title
descriptionExplaination: Please enter a description of the place you have and who you are willing to accept
numPeople: Please enter the number of people you have space for
extraInfo: Please add any other information that you think may be relevant to those who wish to apply to stay with you.
photoMessage: Please drag photos of your available refugee location or click here to select files
agreeTerms: Please check this box to confirm you agree with our terms of service and you are over the age of 18 years old and you are the owner of the property you wish to sponsor a refugee or you have explicit written permission from the owner of the building to do this
townSearch: Please enter the nearest town or city
